Org.OData.Validation.V1.Pattern.@Core.Description: The pattern that a string property, parameter, or term must match. This SHOULD be a valid regular expression, according to the ECMA 262 regular expression dialect.

Org.OData.Validation.V1.Minimum.@Core.Description: Minimum value that a property, parameter, or term can have.

Org.OData.Validation.V1.Maximum.@Core.Description: Maximum value that a property, parameter, or term can have.

Org.OData.Validation.V1.Exclusive.@Core.Description: Tags a Minimum or Maximum as exclusive, i.e. an open interval boundary.

Org.OData.Validation.V1.AllowedValues.@Core.Description: A collection of valid values for the annotated property, parameter, or type definition

Value.@Core.Description: An allowed value for the property, parameter, or type definition

Org.OData.Validation.V1.MultipleOf.@Core.Description: The value of the annotated property, parameter, or term must be an integer multiple of this positive value. For temporal types, the value is measured in seconds.
